name: Charles NINNESS, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS & the State Correctional Institution at Pittsburgh, PA., Appellees

parties: Charles NINNESS, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS & the State Correctional Institution at Pittsburgh, PA., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of February, 2002, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
807 A.2d 812
Charles NINNESS, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS & the State Correctional Institution at Pittsburgh, PA., Appellees.
No. 13 MAP 2002.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 22, 2002.
Reconsideration Denied April 11, 2002.
